title: Retirement Advisor: Thoughts On A Visit With A 95-Year Old
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: A recent visit with a 95-year-old was a reminder of the relative rarity of such encounters. This podcast (5:27) illustrates the health, investing and income implications of reaching a ripe old age, and encourages learning from the wisdom and experience of the elderly to whom we have access. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
